meanings.definition: A player in certain sports, such as football, positioned between the forwards and defenders.
meanings.sent1: The halfbacks ran swiftly on the field.
meanings.sent2: In soccer, halfbacks play a crucial role in both defense and offense.
meanings.sent3: The halfbacks decided to have a race to see who was the fastest.
meanings.sent4: The halfbacks were the bridges connecting the team's offense and defense.
meanings.sent5: The coach emphasized the importance of the halfbacks' strategic positioning.

meanings.definition: A person who plays the position of halfback in a sports team.
meanings.sent1: One of the halfbacks scored a goal in the last match.
meanings.sent2: The team captain praised the halfbacks for their exceptional performance.
meanings.sent3: The halfbacks celebrated their victory with a team dinner.
meanings.sent4: Being a halfback requires quick thinking and agility.
meanings.sent5: The young athlete aspired to become one of the best halfbacks in the league.
